title: Who has composed the most songs in the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: I do agree that it is nearly impossible to answer but I do think there are a few people that have written a ridiculous number of songs. While this list is not an accurate account these people have written more songs than most writers. Prince … while alive wrote 100’s of songs and when he died had hundreds in the vault. he also wrote songs for others under fake names like Jamie Star. Paul McCartney wrote over 200 with the Beatles and 100’s more after the Beatles. Carol King… wrote songs for so many artist in the 60’s before singing songs herself. Neil Diamond wrote songs for others as well before pe Continue Reading

Impossible to answer, because it depends a lot on where you draw the line between the minimum quality. For example, there are people who try to spam Spotify full of random tunes for profit, all of which are basically simple remixes of the most simplistic chord and melody structures and one could argue they are not exactly distinct “songs” per se. But if you accept them to be songs, then there are people who have composed tens of thousands of tunes and continue to do that. If you want to limit the question to more reasonable realm, I’d guess Bach would be quite high on the list. Bach On Bach - We Continue Reading
